name: (R) Best Residential LED Lighting
_description: Highest efficiency A19 E26 LED bulbs available in 2024

notes: Based on the efficacy range for the most efficient 40W and 60W equivalent A19 E26 bulbs on the ENERGY STAR product finder database in 2024 (139 lm/W)

from product pages, EcoSmart 60W Equivalent A19 Dimmable Energy Star Clear Filament Vintage Style Bulb (90 lm/W), IKEA SOLHETTA LED bulb E26 800 lm (133 lm/W), IKEA SOLHETTA LED bulb E26 450 lm (137 lm/W), IKEA SOHLETTA E26 1600 lm (142 lm/W)

installed_cost_source.notes: Based on EcoSmart ($12.98/4:pack), IKEA E26 800 lm ($6.99/2:pack), IKEA E26 450 lm ($1.99/2:pack), IKEA E26 1600 lm ($6.99), adjusted to reflect at least baseline LED cost of $3.68
